content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

SCOPE :-

RASAYAN make market quality Shaking Water bath manufactured by Holy Scientific These shaking water baths have precision temperature control with a robust high quality, highly efficient shaking mechanism that works smoothly and consistently in demanding laboratory applications. The shaking water bath has unique shaking mechanism that allows reciprocating shaking in one product – simply change the orientation of the shaking tray to change from one mode to the other. The shaking water baths are available in different ranges as per the application level.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”480″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border” image_hovers=”false”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

CONSTRUCTION :-

[/vc_column_text]

  • Inner chamber is fabricated out of thick Stainless steel sheet of 304 grades.
  • Outer chamber is fabricated out of thick Mild steel plate duly aesthetical colored powder coated.
  • Gap between both body filled with heavy grade insulation for reduce thermal losses
  • The top cover is made out of thick transparent acrylic sheet or stainless steel
  • Highly efficient shaking mechanism with DC motor & port for regulating the RPM.
  • ISI marked heater for super fast heating.
  • Canopy design top cover made out of S.S or acrylic
  • Lotus clamp for holding flask.
  • Different capacity lotus clamp platform also available on extra cost
  • Temperature range: +50C from ambient to 99.90C
  • Temperature resolution: 0.10C
  • Shaking angle: reciprocating
  • RPM range: 20 RPM to 225 RPM
  • S.S 304 made interior
  • Outer made out of M.S sheet duly powder coated.
  • Canopy top made out of S.S 304 or acrylic as per customer’s requirement
  • Detachable platform for easy interchangeability
  • Heavy grade glass wool or cera wool insulation for reduce thermal losses
  • ISI marked DC motor but work on AC power supply for optimum RPM
  • Drive based RPM control.
  • Analog port for RPM regulation.
  • S.S 304 made lotus clamp
  • Microprocessor based PID temperature controller with PT 100 sensor for accurate temperature controlling. (Optional)
  • Solid state relay for over current protection. (Optional)
  • Microprocessor based digital timer for set cycle. (Optional)
  • Microprocessor based Digital RPM indicator (optional)
  • Drainage valve for water draining purpose.
  • Anti vibration legs.
  • Power supply: 230 Volts, single phase, 50Hz
  • Flask capacity: 250ml,500ml,750ml,1 liter or universal platform is also available on P.O.R.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”693″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” image_hovers=”false” link=”/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/shaking-water-bath.pdf”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
